document.discussion_title: Watch Japan’s leader pull an awesome ‘Super Mario’ stunt at Olympics closing ceremony
document.topic_text: It's not every day you see a world leader dressed up as a famous video game character, but that's exactly what happened during the Rio Olympics ' closing ceremony on Sunday night. »
document.post: It's not every day you see a world leader dressed up as a famous video game character, but that's exactly what happened during the Rio Olympics ' closing ceremony on Sunday night. »
